title: And Then I Found My Prince..ss
description: Rebecca's parents keep asking her when she's going to get a new boyfriend, get married and have babies, but she just wants to focus on work. When Rebecca lands a new promotion and hires a beautiful new assistant, she starts to grow confused about her sexuality. Should she stay in the loveless type of relationship that her parents have long wanted for her, or should she go after the princess that answers her phone and gets her coffee?
author: S.B. Sheeran
